Cover the rows with dry leaves in Sugarcane. Top-dress with 4% potassium to protect crop from water scarcity during summer. Apply sprinkler irrigation to bring down the heat effect. Manage Early Shoot Borer in Sugarcane.
The high temperature increases the water requirement of maize crop. Irrigate the crop. Never allow water to remain stagnant for more than six hours in the field.
High temperature in day hours may lead to wilting in tomato. Apply 1g Streptocyclin in 10 liter water in root zone.

Mulch coconut leaves 1.8 m around a coconut tree to reduce water loss.
Cover with paper caps on the newly planted vegetable seedlings during daytime.

After harvesting of onion, cut the tops leaving 2.0 -2.5 cm above bulb. The harvested bulb should be dried in well-ventilated concrete floored room.
Whitefly Infestation: To prevent whitefly infestation in okra, seeds should be treated with Imidacloprid @ 7-gram/kg of seeds before sowing.
To control mango hoppers, spray Imidacloprid 17.8% SL @ 5 ml/15 litre of water. Application of smoke below the plants can also help in reducing the pest population.
